datamodel.interfaces

Interface IDeliveryRecord

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IObserver, ISubject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Customer, DeliveryRecord

    public interface IDeliveryRecord
extends IObserver, ISubject
    This interface represents the abstract concept of a record of all the consignments (deliveries) shipped by a customer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addDelivery(Delivery newDelivery)
      Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer.
      boolean addDeliveryWithCost(Delivery newDelivery, java.lang.Double costPerKg)
      Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer AND sets the delivery cost per KG to the provided value.
      void clearAll()
      This method clears all delivery entries in this record.
      java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> getDeliveriesByStatus(DeliveryStatus status)
      This method retrieves a list of Delivery objects which have the specified delivery status.
      Delivery getDeliveryAt(int index)
      Retrieves a specific delivery from the records list of Delivery objects.
      int getIndexOfDelivery(Delivery aDelivery)
      Given a Delivery object this method retrieves the index value for the object in this record.
      int getNoOfDeliveries()
      Retrieves the total number of deliveries currently included in this records delivery list.
      void updateDeliveryStatus(int index, DeliveryStatus newStatus)
      Given the index for a delivery and a delivery status this method updates the delivery at the given index to the given status.

      • Methods inherited from interface observerpattern.IObserver

        update

      • Methods inherited from interface observerpattern.ISubject

        notifyObservers, registerObserver, removeObserver

    • Method Detail

      • addDelivery

        boolean addDelivery(Delivery newDelivery)
        Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer.
        Parameters:
        newDelivery - - Delivery object containing all details of a new delivery to add.
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if delivery successfully added to the list of deliveries for a customer, False otherwise.

      • addDeliveryWithCost

        boolean addDeliveryWithCost(Delivery newDelivery,
                          java.lang.Double costPerKg)
        Adds a new delivery (consignment) to the list of deliveries for a customer AND sets the delivery cost per KG to the provided value.
        Parameters:
        newDelivery - - Delivery object containing all details of a new delivery.
        costPerKg - - Double holding the new cost per KG of the delivery.
        Returns:
        - Boolean True if delivery successfully added to the list of deliveries for a customer.

      • clearAll

        void clearAll()
        This method clears all delivery entries in this record.

      • getDeliveriesByStatus

        java.util.ArrayList<Delivery> getDeliveriesByStatus(DeliveryStatus status)
        This method retrieves a list of Delivery objects which have the specified delivery status.
        Parameters:
        status - - DeliveryStatus enumeration value holding the specified delivery status.
        Returns:
        - ArrayList of Delivery objects that have the specified delivery status.

      • getDeliveryAt

        Delivery getDeliveryAt(int index)
        Retrieves a specific delivery from the records list of Delivery objects.
        Parameters:
        index - - Integer being the specific index at which to retrieve a delivery.
        Returns:
        - Delivery object holding the delivery from the specified index.

      • getIndexOfDelivery

        int getIndexOfDelivery(Delivery aDelivery)
        Given a Delivery object this method retrieves the index value for the object in this record. If the delivery is not included in this records list then -1 is returned.
        Parameters:
        aDelivery - - Delivery object of which the index is unknown.
        Returns:
        - Integer holding the index of the given Delivery object.

      • getNoOfDeliveries

        int getNoOfDeliveries()
        Retrieves the total number of deliveries currently included in this records delivery list.
        Returns:
        - Integer holding the total number of deliveries in this records delivery list.

      • updateDeliveryStatus

        void updateDeliveryStatus(int index,
                        DeliveryStatus newStatus)
        Given the index for a delivery and a delivery status this method updates the delivery at the given index to the given status.
        Parameters:
        index - - Integer being the index of a delivery to update.
        newStatus - - DeliveryStatus enumeration value being the new status of the delivery.
